com.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.frame.dither

Class StandardDithering

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.frame.dither.StandardDithering
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DitherHolder

    public final class StandardDithering
extends java.lang.Object
implements DitherHolder
    A class dither implementation which uses a normal get nearest color function. Fast but bad quality.
